text: "Goldstein's Toe Sign" is a feature identified by Dr. Hyman Isaac Goldstein (1887–1954), an American physician and medical historian. A greater distance separates the largest two toes of some people exhibiting Down syndrome or cretinism.""Who Named It Website == References == Wide distance between the great toe and the adjoining toe; associated with cretinism and trisomy 21. Category:Medical signs Category:Toes
title: Goldstein's toe sign
